text:
A Drunken Confession

Dimly lit room, Raskolnikov and Razumihin, tense mood  
Raskolnikov: “Why are they such fools?”  
Razumihin: “You thrashed Zametov, right?”  
Raskolnikov: “Promise, don’t let it slip.”  

---  

Street, Razumihin excited, Raskolnikov listening intently  
Razumihin: “Ilya Petrovitch took advantage of your faint!”  
Raskolnikov: “I fainted from the heat and paint.”  
Razumihin: “You terrified him at the Palais de Cristal!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov learns about the impact of his actions on others while discussing a recent incident with Razumihin.
